From: E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Rhonda=
 WSent: Monday, April 14, 2008 1:28 PMTo: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comSubject: R=
E: [EVP-ITC] Real Time Communication Method Using Sound Soap
 




Hey chic=
ka,

 

Ive always have to change all my exe files to another extension lik=
e .jpg and then change it back once it was D/Led to my computer.  So far I =
havent been able to find an email proggie that will accept those.  I do kno=
w there is a site called Usendit.com I think it is, where people can send B=
IG files and I think you can get exes on that...but its more of an online s=
torage/email type thing where you can go to the site via a link and D/L the=
 file.

But Ive never had a problem with just changing the extensions aroun=
d and back again...its never effected the file for me.

 

RhondaKristin Mo=
rris <ckmorris95@...> wrote:





HELP please!  Well Microsoft ha=
s screwed me over =96 again.  I can not receive .exe files because Outlook =
blocks them completely!  And I found out so does Gmail, my other email acco=
unt.  But I read online that GMAIL can be fooled by changing the extension =
to .bak.  Bruce or Steve can you either of you give that a try for me to se=
nd me the sound soap program?

Other than that =96 is there an email accoun=
t out there that I can setup that will allow me to receive executable files=
?  I am trying to figure out how to change my registry keys in my Win32 pro=
gram but so far no luck.  (I have just enough knowledge to be scary.. yikes=
=85)

Once again =96 thanks for everything guys!

k





From: EVP-ITC@yaho=
ogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of bhali333Sent: Mon=
day, April 14, 2008 8:12 AMTo: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comSubject: [EVP-ITC] Re=
al Time Communication Method Using Sound Soap




Hi Everyone,Anyone that i=
s interested in using the sound soap program with the allaphone file method=
 to do sessions. Here is a short explination of the process.I also would li=
ke to thank my colleuge Steve Hultay for posting the step by step instructi=
ons for using EVP maker with the allaphone file.As Steve has offered, So wi=
ll I. If anyone wants the sound soap program just e-mail me and I will send=
 it to you.paranormalinvestigating@... use the sound soap method,=
 1.Open sound soap2.top menu bar click FILE, on the drop down menu click on=
 "open media file"3.When the OPEN FILE window comes up, go to the folder wi=
th the allaphone file and double click the file.4.Set all features on the s=
ound soap control panel to the "off" position. There are are two up and dow=
n slide bars, left side is for "REMOVE CLICK AND CRACKLE" the right side is=
 for "ENHANCE" both OFF. There are two round dials a right and left, make s=
ure they are slid all the way "COUNTER CLOCKWISE"5.DO NOT TOUCH ANYTHING IN=
 THE OVAL SHAPED PANEL.6.The play bar has two buttons back to back on the l=
eft side, the left button is for returning the file to the beggining. The r=
ight button with the arrow is the play button. On the right side of the pla=
y bar there is a button labeled apply. do not touch it.7.To use the program=
 and do a session, click on the play button, when the file begins to play c=
lick the moving slider arrow on the bottom of the play bar and hold down yo=
ur left mouse button. Thios allows you to "DRAG THE SLIDER ARROW BACK AND F=
ORTH ALONG THE PLAY BAR"This will facilitae manually scrambling the order t=
he file plays in which allows our spirit friends to manipulate the tones in=
to words.Remember to record your sessions! I will be posting a tutorial on =
how to go over a recording shortly.Bruce Halliday
